<letter id='abl445'>
<recipient first='Edwin' last='Stanton' type='individual'/>
<p>
EXECUTIVE MANSION, <a href='/results.php?city=washington' rel='city origin'>WASHINGTON</a>,<br/>
June 4, <a href="/results.php?year=1863">1863</a>.
</p><p>
HON. SECRETARY OF WAR.
</p><p>
MY DEAR SIR:--I have received additional despatches, which, with
former ones, induce me to believe we should revoke or suspend the
order suspending the Chicago Times; and if you concur in opinion,
please have it done.
</p><p>
Yours truly,
</p>
<a href="/results.php?tla=abl" rel="me">A. LINCOLN.</a>
</letter>
